    若しくは<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%8e%4f%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000003000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000003000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000003000000000000000000" target="inyo">第三項</a>

    において準用する<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%95%53%8e%4f%8f%5c%8b%e3%8f%f0%91%e6%88%ea%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000001000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000001000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000001000000000000000000" target="inyo">第百三十九条第一項</a>
    若しくは<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%8e%4f%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000003000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000003000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000013900000000003000000000000000000" target="inyo">第三項</a>

    中「<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%8e%6c%8f%5c%93%f1%8f%f0%91%e6%88%ea%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004200000000001000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004200000000001000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004200000000001000000000000000000" target="inyo">第四十二条第一項</a>
    」とあるのは「更生特例法<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%95%53%8b%e3%8f%5c%98%5a%8f%f0&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000019600000000000000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000019600000000000000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000019600000000000000000000000000000" target="inyo">第百九十六条</a>
    において準用する<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%8e%6c%8f%5c%93%f1%8f%f0%91%e6%88%ea%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004200000000001000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004200000000001000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004200000000001000000000000000000" target="inyo">第四十二条第一項</a>
    」と、<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%93%af%96%40%91%e6%95%53%8e%6c%8f%5c%8b%e3%8f%f0%91%e6%88%ea%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014900000000001000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014900000000001000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014900000000001000000000000000000" target="inyo">同法第百四十九条第一項</a>
    中「<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%95%53%8e%6c%8f%5c%8f%f0%91%e6%93%f1%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000002000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000002000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000002000000000000000000" target="inyo">第百四十条第二項</a>
    （<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%93%af%8f%f0%91%e6%8e%4f%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000003000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000003000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000003000000000000000000" target="inyo">同条第三項</a>
    において準用する場合を含む。）」とあるのは「更生特例法<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%93%f1%95%53%8e%6c%8f%5c%8b%e3%8f%f0&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000024900000000000000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000024900000000000000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000024900000000000000000000000000000" target="inyo">第二百四十九条</a>
    において準用する<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%95%53%8e%6c%8f%5c%8f%f0%91%e6%93%f1%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000002000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000002000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000014000000000002000000000000000000" target="inyo">第百四十条第二項</a>
    」と、「第百三十九条第五項」とあるのは「更生特例法第二百四十八条において準用する第百三十九条第五項」と読み替えるものとする。
    </div>
    
    
    <p>　　　　　　<b><a name="1000000000003000000005000000003000000002000000000000000000000000000000000000000">第二目　更生債権及び更生担保権の確定のための裁判手続</a>
    </b>
    </p><p>
    </p><div class="arttitle"><a name="1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000025500000000000000000000000000000">（更生債権等査定決定等）</a>
    </div><div class="item"><b>第二百五十五条</b>
    <a name="1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000025500000000001000000000000000000"></a>
    　<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%89%ef%8e%d0%8d%58%90%b6%96%40%91%e6%95%53%8c%dc%8f%5c%88%ea%8f%f0&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000000000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000000000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000000000000000000000000" target="inyo">会社更生法第百五十一条</a>
    から<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%95%53%98%5a%8f%5c%8e%4f%8f%f0&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000016300000000000000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000016300000000000000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000016300000000000000000000000000000" target="inyo">第百六十三条</a>
    までの規定は、相互会社の更生手続における更生債権等（更生債権が保険契約に係る債権である場合においては、当該保険契約に係る社員権を含む。）の確定について準用する。この場合において、<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%93%af%96%40%91%e6%95%53%8c%dc%8f%5c%88%ea%8f%f0%91%e6%88%ea%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000001000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000001000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000001000000000000000000" target="inyo">同法第百五十一条第一項</a>
    及び<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%8e%4f%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000003000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000003000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015100000000003000000000000000000" target="inyo">第三項</a>
    並びに<a href="/cgi-bin/idxrefer.cgi?H_FILE=%95%bd%88%ea%8e%6c%96%40%88%ea%8c%dc%8e%6c&amp;REF_NAME=%91%e6%95%53%8c%dc%8f%5c%98%5a%8f%f0%91%e6%88%ea%8d%80&amp;ANCHOR_F=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015600000000001000000000000000000&amp;ANCHOR_T=1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015600000000001000000000000000000#1000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000015600000000001000000000000000000" target="inyo">第百五十六条第一項</a>
